name: Ha Noi Foodie tour and Cooking Demonstration.
description: This One-Day programme aims in giving the closest experience to our very own Ha Noi’s cuisine, tasting the delicious and experiencing the cook. I offer you more than the eyes and tongue possible feeling but satisfying the curious of how-its-made: the hints, the recipes but also show you the other-side of Ha Noi the Dong Da historical. There is more than the Old-quarter, the French-quarter in Ha Noi…
